name: Bah, Humbug!
overview: Merry Christmas? Bah Humbug. That's what Uncle Scrooge would have said. Anyway, this game is NOTHING to do with The Christmas Carol story. You are Mr.Frosty, a young snow man who has been sent out into the cold to collect enough presents for Santa - as one of his elves was just too drunk to do that. Unfortunately at this time of day, the ghost of Christmas spirit decided to play up and cause havoc. It is up to Mr. Frosty to jump on one of the three platforms, collect presents, and watch out for various objects. Some are good objects, others are bad.
